learnings.description: ADR-013A Time Authority Doctrine registered in fhq_meta.adr_registry - establishes database timestamp as authoritative time source for all system operations
IKEA gate verified functional for EXTERNAL_REQUIRED classification - real-time market data queries correctly routed to external retrieval path
IKEA gate verified functional for BLOCKED classification - speculative predictions correctly blocked with hallucination_risk_score 0.92

meta_reflection: Day 20 marks formalization of time authority doctrine and verification of anti-hallucination infrastructure. IKEA gate operational with both EXTERNAL_REQUIRED and BLOCKED classifications validated. TodayWeLearned system activated as learning capture ledger per CEO directive.
